page.title: 15Superstitions,Five Roads
page.content: At the beginning of the last century the people of five roads had little chance of education,as a result they were very superstitious.It was a sign that someone would die in the future if a cock was heard crowing at night or if a comet passed over the village. If you saw a Magpie in your path you could expect bad luck,if you saw two crows you would receive good luck. Some people would even kill a snake before easter to ensure good luck for the rest of the year.People also tell of a white lady who travels along the funeral route of someone about to die.
